useCase.name: Manage Portfolio Photos
useCase.description: Allows the Photographer to add and update photos in their portfolio.

preconditions.precondition: The Photographer should have logged in to the system.
The Photographer has an existing portfolio with photos.

successEndConditions.condition: The portfolio photos were successfully updated.

useCase.trigger: A Photographer wants to manage their portfolio photos.

mainSequence.step: System Retrieves Photos of the Portfolio for the Photographer.
Photographer Clicks on "Add Photo" in the Portfolio.
System Asks for Details of the Photo.
Photographer Sends Photo Details over to System.
System Retrieves updated Photos for the Portfolio and notifies the Photographer.
